env_description: Sandpile grid 30x30 with BTW dynamics. Episodes last up to 1000 steps. Agent can Pulse G, Adjust Beta or Bolster Fcrit.

metric_glossary.large_avalanches: Number of large avalanches in episode
metric_glossary.safety_margin_slope_200_1000: Linear trend of safety margin from step 200 to 1000
metric_glossary.safety_margin_neg_streak_max: Longest consecutive negative safety margin streak (steps)
metric_glossary.prop_margin_negative: Fraction of steps with safety margin below zero
metric_glossary.area_above_target: Integral of safety margin above target
metric_glossary.num_danger_zone_steps: Steps where speed and couple exceed danger thresholds
metric_glossary.time_first_large_avalanche: Step of first large avalanche (-1 if none)
metric_glossary.action1_mean_burst: Average duration of Pulse G bursts (steps)
metric_glossary.action1_mean_cooldown: Average cooldown between Pulse G bursts (steps)
metric_glossary.action2_mean_burst: Average duration of Adjust Beta bursts (steps)
metric_glossary.action2_mean_cooldown: Average cooldown between Adjust Beta bursts (steps)
metric_glossary.action3_mean_burst: Average duration of Bolster Fcrit bursts (steps)
metric_glossary.action3_mean_cooldown: Average cooldown between Bolster Fcrit bursts (steps)

action_schematic: 1: Pulse G - raise topple prob; 2: Adjust Beta - lower k_th; 3: Bolster Fcrit - remove grains.
training_details: PPO with 4 parallel envs for 500k steps; gamma=0.99, gae_lambda=0.95, clip_range=0.2. Reward includes survival bonus and penalties for large avalanches, theta_T breaches and danger-zone steps.
statistical_tests_note: Assume no significance unless p-value provided

variant_note: Harsher penalties to discourage large avalanches and Theta_T breaches.
